publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-229 Rosie Kane: Success of Scotland Team in Homeless World Cup 2003-That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland team on its success in the Homeless World Cup 2003 in Graz, Austria, from 7 to 13 July when the team triumphed in the final round of scheme B and claimed the Network of Street Papers Trophy; applauds the efforts of Paul Ballie, Stewart Griffen, John McAnnany, Mark Elliot, Jason Elliot, Archie Murray, Thomas Commrie and Michael Till, all of whom took the Scotland squad forward in this event; praises the Scotland team for its courage, and notes that, given the right kind of support, those marginalised and excluded from society can achieve great things.
S2M-229 Success of Scotland Team in Homeless World Cup 2003 (lodged on 18 July 2003) Tommy Sheridan*, Colin Fox*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-229 Success of Scotland Team in Homeless World Cup 2003 (lodged on 18 July 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-229 Success of Scotland Team in Homeless World Cup 2003 (lodged on 18 July 2003) Pauline McNeill*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-229 Success of Scotland Team in Homeless World Cup 2003 (lodged on 18 July 2003) Elaine Smith*
